name: Ontario Slam Dunk (3x3)
description: This fast-paced tournament features 3v3 basketball games. Test your skills and teamwork against other competitors.
creator: Ontario Basketball Association

name: Golden Horseshoe Doubles Challenge
description: Grab your partner and compete in this exciting doubles tennis tournament. Different skill categories will be offered.
creator: National Tennis Club
eventAddress: Ottawa, Ontario (Tennis courts at local sports complex)

name: Kick for Kids Charity Cup
description: This co-ed soccer tournament is a fun way to raise money for a great cause. All skill levels are welcome.
creator: Kids Charity Foundation

name: Smash Ontario High Performance Challenge
description: This competitive tournament is designed for high-level badminton players.
creator: Ontario Badminton Association

name: Ontario Major League Baseball (OMLB) Championship
description: This tournament is the culmination of the OMLB league season, with top teams competing for the championship title.
creator: Ontario Major League Baseball

name: Thousand Islands Marathon
description: This scenic marathon winds along the beautiful Thousand Islands Parkway, offering stunning views of the St. Lawrence River.
creator: Thousand Islands Marathon Committee
eventAddress: Kingston, Ontario (Starting and finishing point along the Thousand Islands Parkway)
